channel.title: Changing pc points per match
channel.description:
how do i change the amount of pc points you get per game. im using deltascape base source.
i tryed a couple of things but didnt work.
also how do i change the amount of time before each game starts?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2009, 09:54:19 am[/size][hr]nvm got it to work.
